name: Ext_R5_ConceptMap_gr_el_ta_relationship
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ConceptMap.group.element.target.relationship for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ConceptMap.group.element.target.relationship from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConceptMap|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The relationship between the source and target concepts. The relationship is read from source to target (e.g. source-is-narrower-than-target).
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence` maps to R4 `ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: The 'not-related-to' relationship means that there is no mapping from the source to the target, and the mapping cannot be interpreted without knowing this value as it could mean the elements are equivalent, totally mismatched or anything in between

element.definition: The relationship between the source and target concepts. The relationship is read from source to target (e.g. source-is-narrower-than-target).
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence` maps to R4 `ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
